thread.section_title: DHgate 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 DHgate 的点评意见 | www.dhgate.com
thread.title: DeeAnn

author: DeeAnn
title: DeeAnn
text: Today was my third time ordering with DHgate. Out of the multiple products I've ordered so far, I've had issues with 2 out of about 100-150 items. Otherwise I have been happy with the quality of items that I received, and in some cases they even exceeded my expectations. It helps to look at the vendor ratings, read the item descriptions fully, and send a message if you have questions before ordering. Most vendors say they will take returns but the customer pays return shipping, which can be costly and not worth the trouble. Shipping can be expensive or slow for some items, but it is to be expected when ordering from another country. However, many vendors offer free shipping.
